verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and they <S%H935>brought<s%> it from <S%H72>Eben-ezer<s%> unto <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>, and <S%H3322>set<s%> it <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>.

And when they of <S%H796>Ashdod<s%> arose <S%H7925>early<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, <S%H1712>behold<s%>, Dagon was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>, and <S%H7725>set<s%> him in his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And when they arose <S%H7925>early<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%>, <S%H1712>behold<s%>, Dagon was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> lay cut <S%H3772>off<s%> upon the <S%H4670>threshold<s%>; only the stump of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> was left to <S%H7604>him<s%>.

Therefore neither the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>, nor any that <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H1712>Dagon<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H1869>tread<s%> on the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> in <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

But the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> upon them of <S%H796>Ashdod<s%>, and he <S%H8074>destroyed<s%> <S%H5221>them<s%>, and smote them with <S%H2914>tumors<s%>, even <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> and the borders <S%H1366>thereof<s%>.

And when the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H559>so<s%>, they said, The <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not <S%H3427>abide<s%> with <S%H3027>us<s%>; for his hand is <S%H7185>sore<s%> upon <S%H1712>us<s%>, and upon Dagon our <S%H430>god<s%>.

They <S%H7971>sent<s%> therefore and <S%H622>gathered<s%> all the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, and said, What shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? And they <S%H559>answered<s%>, Let the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be carried <S%H5437>about<s%> unto <S%H1661>Gath<s%>. And they <S%H5437>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5437>thither<s%>.

And it was <S%H310>so<s%>, that, after they had carried it <S%H5437>about<s%>, the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was against the <S%H5892>city<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>discomfiture<s%>: and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%>; and <S%H2914>tumors<s%> brake out upon <S%H8368>them<s%>.

So they <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>. And it came to <S%H727>pass<s%>, as the ark of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>, that the <S%H6139>Ekronites<s%> cried <S%H2199>out<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, They have brought <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4191>us<s%>, to slay us and our <S%H5971>people<s%>.

They <S%H7971>sent<s%> therefore and gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and they <S%H559>said<s%>, Send <S%H7971>away<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and let it go <S%H7725>again<s%> to its own <S%H4725>place<s%>, that is <S%H4191>slay<s%> us <S%H5971>not<s%>, and our people. For there was a <S%H4194>deadly<s%> <S%H4103>discomfiture<s%> throughout all the <S%H5892>city<s%>; the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> heavy <S%H3513>there<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H4191>died<s%> not were <S%H5221>smitten<s%> with the <S%H2914>tumors<s%>; and the <S%H7775>cry<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
